content: is there a way to setup your own mail server to replace mailgun? are there instructions somewhere on how to do this?

If you are selfhosting:
https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/email.html

I use Zulip with a normal mailserver via SMTP.
You might have to change some settings in your Mailserver to allow sending mails from both configured addresses and if enabled from different ones for the regestration mail
i cant see how to setup a smtp server, can this be on the same server as zulip? or should it be on a separate server?
@Matt you should be able to do that on the same server hosting Zulip. I'd recommend postfix if you're planning to use our incoming email gateway.
